product_name: ASICS GEL-Equation 6 Road-Running Shoes - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The men's ASICS GEL-Equation 6 Road-Running Shoes provide exceptional value for runners seeking a comfortable fit and great support. They're suitable for underpronators to mild overpronators. Rearfoot GEL(R) cushioning system absorbs shock during the impact phase of your stride and allows for a smooth transition to midstance. Trusstic System(R) design helps reduce the weight of the shoes without compromising the structural support. High-abrasion rubber is placed in critical areas of the outsoles for excellent traction and durability. Synthetic mesh uppers allow good breathability to keep your feet cool. ASICS GEL-Equation 6 Road-Running Shoes include removable footbeds. Closeout.
short_description: The men's ASICS GEL-Equation 6 Road-Running Shoes provide exceptional value for runners seeking a comfortable fit and great support. They're suitable for underpronators to mild overpronators.
